## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code compiles without warnings (warnings treated as errors)
- [ ] Tests added/updated and passing (unit, integration, UI as applicable)
- [ ] SwiftFormat and SwiftLint passing (`swiftformat . && swiftlint --strict`)
- [ ] No sensitive data committed (secrets, provisioning profiles, API keys)

### Documentation

- [ ] **CHANGELOG.md** updated (if user-facing or architectural change)
- [ ] **KNOWLEDGEBASE.md** updated (if conventions, architecture, or workflows changed)
- [ ] **CONTINUITY.md** updated with decisions + next steps (if applicable)
- [ ] **ADR created/updated** (if this introduces a lasting architectural decision)
- [ ] Inline code documentation added for new public APIs

### Testing

- [ ] Tests run locally and pass
- [ ] Screenshot/video attached (if UI changes)
- [ ] Test output linked or pasted below (if relevant)

<summary>Test output (if applicable)</summary>


</details>

### Beads / Issue Tracking

- [ ] Beads issue(s) updated and closed with completion reason
- [ ] Beads synced (auto-syncs on write; manual `bd sync` if needed)
